title: New & Video: Eyedress – White Lies
content:
Eyedress for the most part has impressed me, but it’s his new tune/video, White Lies, that finally proclaims him as an artist with a level of longevity. Like the material that came before, it’s fairly different in style to his earlier work, with this cut taking a surprisingly interesting glitch/dub approach. Yet despite his sporadic attitude to creation, his music still manages to sound like Eyedress, which for a brand new artist is achievement in itself.

Eyedress – White Lies from EYEDRESS on Vimeo.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
